name: The Dubious Tale of Lonk
description:
This is a simple 2d adventure game in the style of Zelda 2's overworld.

Press f11 once you have launched the preview to fix the graphical errors.

There are enemies spread across the map to fight, each one with different stats and preferred moves in combat. The combat is like rock-paper scissors, with each choice being stronger or weaker against other choices. There is also a small hut to heal in and a treehouse with a strange wizard who will offer you a stronger weapon if you beat the enemies.

Textures by https://itchabop.itch.io/

Font by https://www.fontspace.com/category/8-bit
